articles.author: Brad Lendon, Ivan Watson, Simone McCarthy
articles.title: Zelensky says China’s ‘support to Russia’ will extend war in Ukraine during surprise appearance in Asia - CNN
articles.description: China’s support to Russia will extend the war in Ukraine, President Volodymyr Zelensky said Sunday, as he called on countries across the Asia-Pacific to join an upcoming peace summit he accused Russia of trying to thwart.
articles.content: Chinas support to Russia will extend the war in Ukraine, President Volodymyr Zelensky said Sunday, as he called on countries across the Asia-Pacific to join an upcoming peace summit he accused Russia… [+6456 chars]
